items.sentence: I wish I had time to go home and change into something more appropriate.
I knew I should never have gotten involved with your harebrained scheme.
Tom thought that Mary and John might be dealing with contraband weapons.
The restraining order prevents Tom from being in the same place as Mary.
Quite a lot of people were surprised by the fact that Tom had joined in.
I can put up with a house being untidy, but I don't like it to be dirty.
The lawyer asked the judge to make allowance for the age of the accused.
Tom ate lunch at a small restaurant near the hotel where he was staying.
I will have been to Hokkaido three times if I go once again this summer.
Would you please let me know when it would be convenient for us to meet?
